room_title: Escape room "Peek-a-Boo" by Live Game Escape in Salt Lake City
review: Planned this as a birthday activity and it definitely lived up to our expectations. I highly recommend LiveGame Escape and hope to try a new room the next time we are in Vegas.

room_title: Escape room "Peek-a-Boo" by Live Game Escape in Salt Lake City
review: Such a unique idea! Totally worth going to. If you're looking for something different this is it

room_title: Escape room "Peek-a-Boo" by Live Game Escape in Salt Lake City
review: Amazing idea a great place to go if you are looking for something fun and unique to do with your friends or family. I am definitely going back. And last but not least the staff is friendly and awsome.

room_title: Escape room "Peek-a-Boo" by Live Game Escape in Salt Lake City
review: I truly loved it and will go all the time. But I would love my picture up of that night and yeah I should've purchased the pic. Next time I will because that was a memorable night for us and we don't have anything to show for it. Thank you though for the great experience!!!

room_title: Escape room "Peek-a-Boo" by Live Game Escape in Salt Lake City
review: Really enjoyed the experience tonight. Finished the Peek-A-Boo room (after the timelimit sadly) but still finished! We may have some non friends now lol but worth it. Looking forward to going in another one soon!

room_title: Escape room "Peek-a-Boo" by Live Game Escape in Salt Lake City
review: Great place to be was definitely impressed . A nice place to have family fun we played white lie. Great customer service.

room_title: Escape room "Peek-a-Boo" by Live Game Escape in Salt Lake City
review: We tried the peek-a-boo room and it was our first experience with the escape games. It was challenging and fun at the same time, definitely a good channel to build up relationships within the team. The staff and manager were both there and they were very friendly, explained everything in detail before we went in. Will definitely go back and try out the other rooms!!
